item.title: Monsters & Gold
item.author: dragan.vule98@gmail.com (Dragan Vuletic)
item.description: Exergame developed in Unity during my internship at the HCI Lab of the University of Udine. The game was initially designed for old mobile devices and my job was to implement it with current technolgies and add support for a VR headset and treadmill, allowing for full body movement.
